timeline.headline: Christian Pérez Biography in timeline version
timeline.text: You will see a short biography in timeline style about me.

date.headline: A couple in love
date.text:
A beautiful couple brought their first child at Christmas and in the best year

That year was also born Winona Ryder and Mariah Carey.

This year Intel releases world's first microprocessor, the famous 4004.

Apollo 15 astronauts become the first to ride in a lunar rover a day after landing on the surface.

asset.caption: Vector - Beautiful couple in love with hearts cartoon vector illustration graphic design

date.headline: He show early interest in math.
date.text: At school he achieve several awards by math notes

asset.caption: Illustration of Cartoon man with traveling bag

date.headline: The first travel to the Caicedonia (Valle del Cauca)
date.text: This year, he travel alone outside from home.

asset.caption: Illustration of Cartoon man with traveling bag

date.headline: He begin to study in the best technical college in the neighbor
date.text: The boy begin his secondary studies in the 'Escuela Industrial de Cundinamarca' where achieve several awards by academic perfomance and national results in ICFES tests.

asset.media: “You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself in any direction you choose. You're on your own, and you know what you know. And you are the guy who'll decide where to go.”

date.headline: Achieve higher education grade
date.text: The boy achieve his first diploma in higher technical education with emphasis in mechanics.

asset.credit: By Jamie McIvor - BBC Scotland education correspondent
asset.caption: Scottish graduates ...

asset.credit: By Jamie McIvor - BBC Scotland education correspondent

date.headline: Like a sun, a beautiful women change the game
date.text: Working in the army, he knows his future wife.
